Title.evidence: This systematic review was conducted to evaluate the optimal weight scalar to dose sugammadex in a morbidly obese (MO) patient population (BMI≥40 kg/m 2 ).

Objective.evidence: This systematic review was conducted to evaluate the optimal weight scalar to dose sugammadex in a morbidly obese (MO) patient population (BMI≥40 kg/m 2 ).

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was recovery time from moderate neuromuscular blockade (NMB) or deep NMB.

Result_Outcome.evidence: A dose of 2 mg/kg of sugammadex based on 40% CBW and a 4 mg/kg dose of sugammadex based on 40% CBW provide a reliable and timely reversal of moderate and deep NMB respectively in the MO patients.
